description: A European hot hatch sharpened to a razor's edge. The Venom RS is all about corner speed — the chassis is so planted, so communicative, that it feels like an extension of the driver. Limited slip diff, close-ratio gearbox, and not an ounce of fat.
lore: Stradale's RS badge means one thing: no compromises. The Venom RS was developed on the Nurburgring and it shows — every component exists to go faster around corners. The purists swear by it. The straight-line crowd doesn't understand it. Both camps are right.
